sentences.sContent: She started to sit up, grimaced, and sank back weakly against the pillow.
sentences.sCn: 她开始坐起来，痛苦地皱着脸，又虚弱地靠回到枕头上。

trans.tranOther: If you grimace, you twist your face in an ugly way because you are annoyed, disgusted, or in pain
an expression you make by twisting your face because you do not like something or because you are feeling pain
